content: double_crochet 12dc 3rd round 1dc 2dc in next double_crochet 6 times 18dc to complete sew the beak between the eyes positioning the wings at an angle pointing down towards the lower back part of the body sew the wings flat to the sides of the body with a few sts behind the top of the wing leaving the lower parts of the wings unsewn using c and 3 sts for each toe embroider bird feet onto the front part of the base of the body see diagram happy cotton free pattern lots of happy cotton homer pigeon ref 2559 pattern books to collect book 6 all dressed up book 4 two of a kind book 2 one shape two ways book 9 baby love for more inspiration /knitsirdar #sirdarmakes @knitsirdar /knitsirdar www sirdar com
